entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries at times heavy this evening and ending near midnight then clearing. Risk of snow squalls late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:10 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High zero.
